links.*: Aldarion and Erendis: The Mariner's Wife

wikitext.*:
'''"Father of the Isle"''' was a title applied to the ruling King of [[Númenor]]. In particular, it is used by [[Tar-Meneldur]] in the tale of [[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]] and [[Erendis]].<ref>{{UT|Wife}}</ref>
